K12D0485_H0458:431b-16: dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12D0485_H0458:431b-17: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba rab tu bshad par bya ste /
K12D0485_H0458:431b-18: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am aa dya nu ta panna tva ta /

K12D0485_H0458:431b-26: de'i steng du yi ge kam las gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
K12D0485_H0458:431b-27: de'i steng du dbus su h'um su h'um zhes bya ba ste /
K12D0485_H0458:432a-1: ra ba gru bzhi pa rin po che'i rang bzhin

K12D0485_H0458:432a-3: / aom badzra dri dho zhes pa la sogs pa dang /

K12D0485_H0458:432a-8: rin po che'i rtse mo tsan gyi gzhal yas khang /
K12D0485_H0458:432a-9: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //

K12D0485_H0458:432a-18: de'i lte ba'i steng du sengge'i gdan no //

K12D0485_H0458:432a-23: brgyad blta'o // sengge'i gdan gyi steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge aa la sogs pa dang /

K12D0485_H0458:432b-0: @432b byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems

K12D0485_H0458:432b-13: ji ltar padma la chags pa'i //

K12D0485_H0458:433a-33: lho yi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs //
K12D0485_H0458:433b-0: padma zla ba'i @433b dbus su ni //

K12D0485_H0458:473a-13: rdo rje log 'dren phran bra ba byi ba la zhon pa mdog dkar po /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-14: glang po che'i gdong pa can /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-15: phyag g-yas dag na rdo rje dang /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-17: g-yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-18: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473a-19: rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-20: g-yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g-yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba la zhon pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473a-21: klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa dang gdengs ka brgyad pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-22: mdog dkar po g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-23: g-yon pa klu'i zhags pa'i 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473a-24: rdo rje chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-25: mdog dkar po gdengs ka brgyad ma /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-27: g-yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473a-28: 'jigs mdog ma ljang gu g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12D0485_H0458:473a-29: g-yon pas ral gri be ta ka 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-0: dpal mo mdog dkar ser g-yas @473b pas rdo rje 'dzin cing /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-2: dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-3: phyag g-yon pas pi wang dang g-yas pas rdo rje ma'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-4: bgrod ka mdeg ljang gu sengge la zhon pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-5: phyag g-yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-6: g-yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-8: drag po la sogs pa dang /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-9: chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-10: gang phyag g-yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-13: de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti
K12D0485_H0458:473b-14: rin ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon
K12D0485_H0458:473b-15: po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go
K12D0485_H0458:473b-16: / yi ge h'um bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par snang mdzad la skor ba bdun dang /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-18: dril bu'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-19: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang /
K12D0485_H0458:473b-20: chad pa'i nyes bzhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas
K12D0485_H0458:473b-21: te phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas rdo
K12D0485_H0458:473b-22: rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge h'um bzhi
K12D0485_H0458:473b-23: pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-24: ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-25: gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-26: mkhas pas lhag pa rnam spang phyir //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-27: rdo rje dril bu kun tog bya //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-30: de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi //
K12D0485_H0458:473b-31: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-1: rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-2: yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-3: aom badzro tagha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha h'um zhes bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-5: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-6: mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-7: legs par drag tu rnam par dbye //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-8: sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin //
K12D0485_H0458:474a-10: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la rin po che bdun las byas pa'am /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-11: sa las byas pa'i bum pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-12: nag po la sogs pa med pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-16: lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-19: 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-20: yal 'dab dang bcas pa mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-21: phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-22: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-23: rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-24: khro bo ti rin ti ris yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-25: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya ba 'di
K12D0485_H0458:474a-26: stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge h'um
K12D0485_H0458:474a-27: bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas
K12D0485_H0458:474a-28: la / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go /
K12D0485_H0458:474a-29: 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol
K12D0485_H0458:474a-30: du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge h'um bzhi
K12D0485_H0458:474b-0: pa @474b brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag go /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-1: de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba
K12D0485_H0458:474b-2: bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma
K12D0485_H0458:474b-4: byu ru de bzhin sa le spram //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-5: dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-6: rin chen kun te sing ghri dang //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-7: by'a ghr'i gi ri be be ri //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-8: sman kun til nas sran ma sha /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-9: 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-10: sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-11: de'i rjes la phyag rgya bzhi la sogs pa sngon
K12D0485_H0458:474b-12: du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo
K12D0485_H0458:474b-13: rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang yongs
K12D0485_H0458:474b-14: su bzlas te / sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis gtsug tor bcing ba dang /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-15: sgo skyong gis gdong bcing ba dang /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-16: rdo rje go chas stod g-yogs dang /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-17: gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyis slob dpon gyis
K12D0485_H0458:474b-18: khro bo ti rin ti ris me tog sngon po'i
K12D0485_H0458:474b-20: aom badzra ma ya ma pra be sh'a mi zhes
K12D0485_H0458:474b-21: brjod cing zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0485_H0458:474b-23: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
K12D0485_H0458:474b-24: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-25: phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-27: ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te /
K12D0485_H0458:474b-28: tishtha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag
K12D0485_H0458:474b-29: rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba
K12D0485_H0458:475a-5: bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom
K12D0485_H0458:475a-6: ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0485_H0458:475a-7: phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang
K12D0485_H0458:475a-11: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la /
K12D0485_H0458:475a-12: me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par
K12D0485_H0458:475a-13: mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su
K12D0485_H0458:475a-14: gnang ba dang / yi ge h'um gis gzengs bstod pa dang /
K12D0485_H0458:475a-15: lung bstan pa yang smos la /
K12D0485_H0458:475a-16: slar yang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas
K12D0485_H0458:475a-17: la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang
K12D0485_H0458:475a-18: ste h'um k'a ra badzra ham zhes pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:475a-19: rang gi mtshan brjod par bya zhing rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing la /
K12D0485_H0458:475a-20: de'i sngags aa: 'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam
K12D0485_H0458:475a-21: par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0485_H0458:475a-22: rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo //
K12D0485_H0458:475a-23: badzro ham zhes bya ba yis rdo rje'i nga rgyal
K12D0485_H0458:475a-24: rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang
K12D0485_H0458:475a-26: badzra dh'a tu aa ham zhes pa'o //
K12D0485_H0458:475a-27: de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya
K12D0485_H0458:475a-28: chen po bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aa:'i
K12D0485_H0458:475a-29: rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje dril bu bdag
K12D0485_H0458:475a-30: nyid dbab pa'o // badzra ghando ham zhes pa'i nga
K12D0485_H0458:475a-31: rgyal bskyed la de badzra a'a be sha kro dho
K12D0485_H0458:475b-1: de lta bu'i rdo rjer bsgrub pa yin no //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-2: de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'
K12D0485_H0458:475b-3: rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par
K12D0485_H0458:475b-4: gtogs par byed cing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par
K12D0485_H0458:475b-5: bya ste / aom badzra sa m'a ya dza: dza:
K12D0485_H0458:475b-6: h'um bam ho: zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0485_H0458:475b-8: de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12D0485_H0458:475b-9: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig brjod do //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-10: de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go /
K12D0485_H0458:475b-11: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste /
K12D0485_H0458:475b-12: bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin
K12D0485_H0458:475b-13: du yi ge h'um bzhi pas mchod yon phul te
K12D0485_H0458:475b-14: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig
K12D0485_H0458:475b-16: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te
K12D0485_H0458:475b-17: rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing
K12D0485_H0458:475b-18: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma
K12D0485_H0458:475b-19: ya stvam aa ham/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-21: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-22: rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-23: dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-24: khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-25: de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-26: lag par rdo rje kun tu bsnol //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-27: mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-28: mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-29: 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal zhes //
K12D0485_H0458:475b-30: de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-2: bsnyams la dbu ma padma nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-3: gung mo mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-4: sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-5: g-yas pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-6: de dag nyid sbyar yi ge h'um//
K12D0485_H0458:476a-7: legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-8: mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-9: snying gar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-10: lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-11: mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-12: mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig /
K12D0485_H0458:476a-13: g-yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-14: gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-15: kha las rab mchog mthon pa yi //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-16: mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-17: mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-18: mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-19: rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdam //

K12D0485_H0458:476a-21: su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste
K12D0485_H0458:476a-22: // rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-23: snying gar yang na mthe bong mnyam //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-24: legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-25: thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-26: gar las sbyi por thal mo sbyar //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin //
K12D0485_H0458:476a-28: thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor //

K12D0485_H0458:476a-32: mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings //
K12D0485_H0458:476b-0: mthe @476b bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing //
K12D0485_H0458:476b-1: rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:476b-3: snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa

K12D0485_H0458:476b-5: cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o //

K12D0485_H0458:476b-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni /
K12D0485_H0458:476b-12: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi gnas su yang ngo //
K12D0485_H0458:476b-13: de nas rin chen h'um mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sdags rnams 'byung ste /
K12D0485_H0458:476b-14: aom bdzra bhri ku ti kro dha a'a na ya sarba ratn ni hr'i: h'um phat/

K12D0485_H0458:476b-16: aom bdzra bi shva kro dha ku ru sarb bi shva ru p'a ya s'a dha ya h'um phat/

K12D0485_H0458:476b-19: rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do

K12D0485_H0458:477b-19: go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog /

K12D0485_H0458:477b-27: dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las //
K12D0485_H0458:477b-28: mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags //
K12D0485_H0458:477b-29: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis //
K12D0485_H0458:477b-30: mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che //

K12D0485_H0458:478a-0: de nas rnam par snang mdzad pa sogs pa rnams kyi bcing @478a *//
K12D0485_H0458:478a-5: las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang /
K12D0485_H0458:478a-6: mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /

K12D0485_H0458:478a-8: gang gi phyag rgya gang dang /
K12D0485_H0458:478a-9: gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo //

K12D0485_H0458:478a-20: rdo rje bskyed la de rnams 'dri bya'i rjes su
K12D0485_H0458:478a-21: 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las
K12D0485_H0458:478a-23: rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams

K12D0485_H0458:478a-29: ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse

K12D0485_H0458:478b-2: de las gzhan ni rab bshad bya //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-3: sgyu ma rdo rje sogs ming can //

K12D0485_H0458:478b-6: rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa //

K12D0485_H0458:478b-8: rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang byas //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-9: mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-10: rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi //

K12D0485_H0458:478b-12: mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-13: mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-14: aom gyi rnam pa sbyi bor gnas //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-15: rdo rje shugs kyis rab tu gnas //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-17: phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-18: lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-19: lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-20: lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-21: kha las yongs su bskor ba nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-22: rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-23: g-yon pa'i mthe bo legs gnas kyang //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-24: phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-25: g-yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang //

K12D0485_H0458:478b-27: tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-28: g-yas pa gshol ni gzung ba dang //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-29: de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-30: g-yas pas 'bar ba kun du ston //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-31: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-32: pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-33: bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-34: byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor //
K12D0485_H0458:478b-35: lag pa bskum pa sbyar ba dang /
K12D0485_H0458:479a-2: bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so //

K12D0485_H0458:479a-4: g-yos pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-5: rtse gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-6: 'di bcing ba yi yang dag pa'i //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-7: dngos grub rig pa mchog rang nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-8: rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-9: g-yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-10: cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig gi /

K12D0485_H0458:479a-12: 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun bsdam //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-13: de bzhin bu yi phyag rgya dang //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-14: aom yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-15: yi ge rna can yongs su gzung //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-16: phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-17: 'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid //

K12D0485_H0458:479a-22: phyag rgya phreng ba rdo rje bcings //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-23: ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid //

K12D0485_H0458:479a-29: mdun du dul bar gnas pa nyid //

K12D0485_H0458:479a-31: gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-32: bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed //
K12D0485_H0458:479a-33: lag ngar bsnol dang ma bsnol dang //
K12D0485_H0458:479b-1: bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no //

K12D0485_H0458:479b-5: rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi phyag rgyar
K12D0485_H0458:479b-6: 'gyur ro // rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse
K12D0485_H0458:479b-7: lnga pa bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i
K12D0485_H0458:479b-8: rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:479b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang //
K12D0485_H0458:479b-10: bskal pa bzang po ba dang /

K12D0485_H0458:479b-16: de nas mchod yon phul la mchod par bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:479b-17: de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum par

K12D0485_H0458:479b-19: rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa rnams par snang mdzad

K12D0485_H0458:479b-22: // bum pa gang ba rnams dang /

K12D0485_H0458:480a-0: @480a *// badzra spha ra na kham zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo //

K12D0485_H0458:480a-13: tsandan la sogs pa legs par bsres la /
K12D0485_H0458:480a-14: de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /

K12D0485_H0458:480a-24: sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i kong bu stong dang /
K12D0485_H0458:480a-26: bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang /
K12D0485_H0458:480a-27: aom badzra a'a lo ke h'um zhes pa 'di mar
K12D0485_H0458:480a-28: me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la

K12D0485_H0458:480a-30: bar bya'o // gtor ma'i nye bar spyod pa 'bum dang /
K12D0485_H0458:480b-0: bkra shis can @480b dang por bya ste /
K12D0485_H0458:480b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas te /

K12D0485_H0458:480b-3: dya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces pa brjod cing dbul
K12D0485_H0458:480b-4: bar bya'o // rol mo bcu dang /
K12D0485_H0458:480b-9: gang yang rung ba la yi ge h'um dang /

K12D0485_H0458:480b-12: rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste /
K12D0485_H0458:480b-21: rnga ti mi la'i stang stabs so //

K12D0485_H0458:480b-28: rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /

K12D0485_H0458:480b-31: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa dang /
K12D0485_H0458:480b-36: brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo //

K12D0485_H0458:480b-42: badzra ka rma ka ro dbha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la /
K12D0485_H0458:481a-1: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad
K12D0485_H0458:481a-2: po rnams kyis khor bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan

K12D0485_H0458:481a-9: kyis kyang legs par mchod la /

K12D0485_H0458:481a-15: chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas //
K12D0485_H0458:481a-16: sran chan bcas shing snum khur la //
K12D0485_H0458:481a-17: sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni //

K12D0485_H0458:481a-19: gsum gsum gter bar byas te dri dang /
K12D0485_H0458:481a-23: mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang /
K12D0485_H0458:481a-25: de la dang po re zhig mandal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0485_H0458:481b-0: de nas dam tshig bstan @481b no //

K12D0485_H0458:481b-3: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //

K12D0485_H0458:481b-23: su mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar ba ni
